thread.title: Morning Technical Insight on These Auto Parts Stocks -- American Axle & Manufacturing, Aptiv, Autoliv, BorgWarner

author: cnbc.com
title: Morning Technical Insight on These Auto Parts Stocks -- American Axle & Manufacturing, Aptiv, Autoliv, BorgWarner
text:
NEW YORK, Feb. 20, 2018 /PRNewswire/ --
WallStEquities.com strives to bring the best free research to the investment community. Today we are offering reports on AXL, APTV, ALV, and BWA which can be accessed for free by signing up to www.wallstequities.com/registration . Demand for auto parts is driven by new car sales, which are strongly affected by interest rates and by the Replacement market. Company profitability depends partly on the difficulty of manufacturing products and partly on demand volume, since many costs are fixed. This morning, WallStEquities.com redirects investors' attention to four stocks in the Auto Parts space to see how they have fared at the close of the last trading session: American Axle & Manufacturing Holdings Inc. (NYSE: AXL), Aptiv PLC (NYSE: APTV), Autoliv Inc. (NYSE: ALV), and BorgWarner Inc. (NYSE: BWA). All you have to do is sign up today for this free limited time offer by clicking the link below.
www.wallstequities.com/registration
American Axle & Manufacturing Holdings
Shares in Detroit, Michigan headquartered American Axle & Manufacturing Holdings Inc. ended Friday's session 3.55% lower at $15.22. A total volume of 5.43 million shares was traded, which was above their three months average volume of 2.24 million shares. The stock is trading 8.14% below its 200-day moving average. Moreover, shares of the Company have a Relative Strength Index (RSI) of 31.64.
On January 25 th , 2018, American Axle & Manufacturing Holdings ("AXL") announced that the Company and Drexler Automotive GmbH have entered into an agreement to expand their relationship and bring high-performance differentials and differential technologies from the premium market to the general market of passenger cars, light trucks, crossovers, and SUVs. The expanded relationship between the duo immediately integrates Electro-Mechanical limited slip differentials into the AXL's TracRite family of differential products. Get the full research report on AXL for free by clicking below at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=AXL
Aptiv
Gillingham, the UK-based Aptiv PLC's shares saw a decline of 1.00%, closing the day at $92.40. A total volume of 1.15 million shares was traded. The stock has advanced 12.39% in the previous three months and 46.66% over the past year. The Company's shares are trading 3.04% and 13.68% above their 50-day and 200-day moving averages, respectively. Additionally, shares of Aptiv have an RSI of 52.66.
On February 14 th , 2018, Aptiv announced that it will present at the Barclays Industrial Select Conference on February 21 st , 2018 in Miami. President and CEO, Kevin Clark, and Senior Vice President and CFO, Joseph Massaro, are scheduled to participate in a fireside chat at 9:45 a.m. ET that day. A simultaneous webcast of the presentation will be available on the Company's Investor Relations website. To experience our free membership services anytime/ anywhere and access the free report on APTV, click to register at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=APTV
Autoliv
Last Friday, shares in Stockholm, Sweden headquartered Autoliv Inc. declined slightly by 0.44%, closing the session at $145.81. The stock recorded a trading volume of 542,870 shares. The Company's shares have advanced 7.47% in the last month, 21.51% over the previous three months, and 35.85% over the past year. The stock is trading 8.27% above its 50-day moving average and 21.54% above its 200-day moving average. Furthermore, shares of Autoliv have an RSI of 59.55.
On January 30 th , 2018, research firm Mizuho reiterated its 'Buy' rating on the Company's stock with an increase of the target price from $140 a share to $160 a share.
On February 14 th , 2018, Autoliv announced that its Board of Directors has declared a quarterly dividend of 62 cents per share for Q2 2018 - an increase of $0.02 per share from the previous level. The dividend will be payable on June 07 th , 2018, to shareholders of record on the close of business on May 23 rd , 2018. Join our big investor community at Wall St. Equities today and get your free report on ALV at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=ALV
BorgWarner
BorgWarner Inc.'s stock finished the session 0.85% lower at $52.22 with a total trading volume of 1.36 million shares. The Company's shares have advanced 1.04% over the previous three months and 26.20% over the past year. The stock is trading above its 200-day moving average by 7.08%. Additionally, shares of BorgWarner, which provides solutions for combustion, hybrid, and electric vehicles worldwide, have an RSI of 42.32.
On February 08 th , 2018, BorgWarner's Board of Directors declared a quarterly cash dividend of $0.17 per share of common stock. The dividend is payable on March 15 th , 2018, to shareholders of record on March 01 st , 2018.
On February 09 th , 2018, research firm RBC Capital Markets upgraded the Company's stock rating from 'Sector Perform' to 'Outperform'. Know more about BWA in our free research coverage at: www.wallstequities.com/registration/?symbol=BWA
--
